survey_properties.intro_message:
Dear User,
your feedback helps us to analyze
the effects of smartphone notifications
on the stress level.

Therefore you have to fill a survey.
It will take less than 5 minutes
to answer the questions.

The collected data is securely stored.
We do guarantee no data misuse and
privacy is completely preserved.
Thank you.
survey_properties.end_message: Thank you for answering our survey.

questions.question_title: 1. In the last day, how often have you been upset because of something that happened unexpectedly?
2. In the last day, how often have you felt that you were unable to control the important things in your life?
3. In the last day, how often have you felt nervous and "stressed"?
4. In the last day, how often have you dealt successfully with irritating life hassles?
5. In the last day, how often have you felt that you were effectively coping with important changes were occurring in your life?
6. In the last day, how often have you felt confident about your ability to handle your personal problems?
7. In the last day, how often have you felt that things were going your way?
8. In the last day, how often have you found that you could not cope with all the things that you had to do?
9. In the last day, how often have you been able to control irritations in your life?
10. In the last day, how often have you felt that you were on top of things?
11. In the last day, how often have you been angered because of things that happened that were outside of your control?
12. In the last day, how often have you found yourself thinking about things that you have to accomplish?
13. In the last day, how often have you been able to control the way you spend your time?
14. In the last day, how often have you felt difficulties were piling up so high that you could not overcome them?
